description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Pad Thai recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir through bean sprouts and cooked egg; top with crushed peanuts and if desired, serve with fresh lime wedges. Note: If you are using shelf-fresh noodles you will need approximately 400g. Prepare noodles according to directions on packet, and use in step 3. Serving suggestion: For a meat-free meal try firm tofu chopped into 2cm cubes.

Stir through bean sprouts and cooked egg; top with crushed peanuts and if desired, serve with fresh lime wedges. Note: If you are using shelf-fresh noodles you will need approximately 400g. Prepare noodles according to directions on packet, and use in step 3. Serving suggestion: For a meat-free meal try firm tofu chopped into 2cm cubes.

Prepare noodles according to directions on packet, and use in step 3. Serving suggestion: For a meat-free meal try firm tofu chopped into 2cm cubes.

Prepare noodles according to directions on packet, and use in step 3. Serving suggestion: For a meat-free meal try firm tofu chopped into 2cm cubes.
